inclusion.criterion: Histological diagnoses of operable invasive adenocarcinoma of the breast (T1-T3)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hepatic function: total bilirubin <= 1 upper normal limit (UNL)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Negative status of HER2 in primary tumour, known before randomization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adjuvant chemotherapy consisting of a minimum of 6 courses with anthracyclines and/or taxanes
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must not present evidence of metastatic disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Negative pregnancy test done in the 14 previous days to randomization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients able to comply with treatment and study follow-up
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior therapy with anthracyclines or taxanes (paclitaxel or docetaxel) for any malignancy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or lactating women. Adequate contraceptive methods must be used during chemotherapy and hormone therapy treatments.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer.
